/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen in the distance, hinting at the city's bustling life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
